detaileddescription.para: Implemtation of NFS4_OP_CLOSE. Implementation is partial for now, so it always returns NFS4_OK.

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] Pointer to the compound request's data

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_close_Free: frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_close.
Frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_close.
